title: Waking Dream: Devlin
description: Devlin is the first book in this nine novel series that explores the universe as a Waking Dream. Over the centuries, people known as Dreamers and Immortals learned how to change the reality by tapping into a primordial force known as the Weird - the energy responsible for the creation of the physical world.Set in the present day, in the strange, hidden town of Devlin nestled in the mountains of Virginia, a battle for the control of reality is about to begin. With the Halloween festival upon them,the Dreamers of Devlin uncover a dark plot while investigating the history of their forgotten town. As they prepare for the Protection Ritual that keeps their town hidden away from the rest of the world, they discover that one Immortal will attempt to enshroud the planet in eternal twilight and madness. Auber Weir and the others race to uncover the identity of the Immortal at the center of this insidious plot. If their unknown nemesis succeeds in finding an ancient artifact known as the Black Heart, all will be lost.By the end of the book, one is left to wondered if they are a Dreamer, an Immortal, or a merely a Sleeper. Awaken your Weirdness and change the world.
author: Michael  Hibbard
